function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of surveillance data for monitoring physical distancing","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, data security concerns, and ethical implications","Mitigation":"Obtain consent for data collection, implement encryption and strict access controls, and adhere to ethical guidelines","Technologies":"Encryption, access control systems, privacy-preserving algorithms","People":"General public, individuals in crowded areas","Owner":"System developers, administrators, and data custodians"},{"Description":"Intrusive alerting system","Impact":"Discomfort, annoyance, and resistance from the crowd being monitored","Mitigation":"Implement non-intrusive alerting systems, use non-audible alerts, and consider cultural and social norms","Technologies":"Non-audible alerts, cultural sensitivity algorithms","People":"Crowds in monitored areas","Owner":"System developers, administrators, and data custodians"},{"Description":"Perspective transformation of video feed","Impact":"Potential inaccuracies in distance estimation and tracking due to perspective distortion","Mitigation":"Calibrate camera systems, use multiple camera angles, and apply perspective correction algorithms","Technologies":"Camera calibration systems, multi-camera setups, perspective correction algorithms","People":"System operators, developers, and researchers","Owner":"System developers and operators"}]}
